name: $directlink
desc: When the API method (e.g. [base_url]/[parameter]) related with the URL of the website is executed, the resource can be seen directly (usually in JSON or XML format)

name: $openapi
desc: When logged into the website, the resource can be seen.

name: $login
desc: When logged in and  follow the API in the website related with URL, the resource can be seen.

name: $oauth
desc: Some other complicated or particular way to get resource from URL.
